posts.title: I Am Not A Writer
posts.description: “Good design makes a product understandable — It clarifies the product’s structure. Better still, it can make the product clearly express its function by making use of the user’s intuition. At best, it is self-explanatory.” — Dieter Rams
posts.author: Alia Munger
